title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7310.10 - Medical diets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7310.10 - Medical diets

State Regulations

Each facility shall establish a program of prescription and
provision of therapeutic nutrition, as ordered by the facility medical
director, for all youth in need of such program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7310.10

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
